snippet: The program “New York to Paris, Paris to Paradise” at Merkin Concert Hall featured four young singers exploring the musical allure of Paris.
abstract: Anthony Tommasini reviews program New york to Paris, Paris to Paradise, presented by the New York Festival of Song at Merkin Concert Hall.
lead_paragraph: The program “New York to Paris, Paris to Paradise” at Merkin Concert Hall featured four young singers exploring the musical allure of Paris.

headline.seo: ‘New York to Paris, Paris to Paradise’ at Merkin Hall
headline.main: The Musical Colors of the City of Light
headline.print_headline: The Musical Colors of the City of Light
